name: RandomService_hexTest
description: Unit tests for the hex method in RandomService, which generates hexadecimal strings with specified length and case.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthAndUppercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a positive length and uppercase flag, ensuring the result is an 8-character string matching the expected hexadecimal pattern.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthAndLowercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a positive length and lowercase flag, ensuring the result is an 8-character string matching the expected hexadecimal pattern.

test_cases.name: testHexWithZeroLength
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a zero length, ensuring the result is an empty string.

test_cases.name: testHexWithNegativeLength
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a negative length, ensuring the result is an empty string.
